Package de.magicmarcy.simplelog2file

Class SimpleLog2File

java.lang.Object
de.magicmarcy.simplelog2file.SimpleLog2File
public class SimpleLog2File extends Object
Just a simple file-Logger. Per default the file is stored in the project root-folder but the destination can be overwritten in the constructor of this class.

    creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE

    creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Entry" to mark the method entry in the logfile

    creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Entry" followed by the object to mark the method entry in the logfile

      public void trace(Object object)
      creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [TRACE] [Main.main()] Proceed with method
      Parameters:
      object - the log-message or an object

    • traceEntry

      public void traceEntry()
      creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Entry" to mark the method entry in the logfile 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [TRACE] [Main.main()] Entry

    • traceEntry

      public void traceEntry(Object object)
      creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Entry" followed by the object to mark the method entry in the logfile 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [TRACE] [Main.main()] Entry -> name=simple
      Parameters:
      object - the log-message or an object

    • traceExit

      public void traceExit()
      creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Exit" to mark the method exit in the logfile 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [TRACE] [Main.main()] Exit

    • traceExit

      public <T> T traceExit(T result)
      creates a new line in the logfile with level TRACE and the output "Exit" followed by the object to mark the method exit in the logfile 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [TRACE] [Main.main()] Exit -> 1
      Parameters:
      result - the log-message or an object
      Returns:
      returns the result as passed in

    • sql

      public void sql(Object object)
      creates a new line in the logfile with level SQL to log sql statements 
       2024-01-10 17:23:02.009 [SQL  ] [Main.main()] Folgender SQL wird ausgefuehrt:
 SELECT * FROM PERSON
      Parameters:
